name: RMD-MP
savepath: Another solid update with some key improvements, new additions and our usual cleanup in the debug aisle. Players who miss the 'Mosaic' Sin will likely rejoice in some of the new changes, and we've added more potency to Summon Power, in the form of merc aura benefits. I'm still leaving out a lot, so check the patch notes for full details, Enjoy!

The Sunder Mechanic and Terror Zones are now available via D2RHUD 1.1.2+. This will enable re-created features that mimic the official implementation, but with some slight upgrades and more planned improvements in the future. Please visit our discord for more details about how the systems work and info you might need as a mod author.
